Actually, the problem did occur when I tried to switch to another editor 
already opened (SingleNameReference) using the editor tabs.

In fact, clicking anywhere else than inside this very original editor is 
causing me the same grief.

In the end I had to exit my workspace, since the error was blocking most 
functionalities to perform.
*** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of 14980 ***
